seg.source: Wütende Mutter wehrt sich: Lindsay Lohan greift Flüchtlingsfamilie auf offener Straße an
seg.translation: Angry mother defends herself: Lindsay Lohan attacks refugee family on the street
Angry mother defends herself: Lindsay Lohan attacks refugee family on the street
Angry mother fights back: Lindsay Lohan attacks refugee family on the street

seg.source: Was hat Lindsay Lohan nur zu dieser äußerst merkwürdigen Aktion getrieben?
seg.translation: What provoked Lindsay Lohan to such very strange actions?
What made Lindsay Lohan commit this extremely strange act?
What was it that drove Lindsay Lohan to this very strange action?

seg.source: Sie wollte einer angeblichen Flüchtlingsfamilie offenbar die Kinder entreißen.
seg.translation: She apparently wanted to lure the children away from the alleged refugee family.
It appears she wanted to take away the children of a reported refugee family.
She apparently wanted to snatch the children from an alleged refugee family.

seg.source: Lindsay Lohan (32, "Herbie: Fully Loaded") hat selbst live gestreamt, wie sie einer Familie in Moskau offenbar die Kinder entreißen möchte.
seg.translation: Lindsay Lohan (32, ‘Herbie: Fully Loaded’) has live streamed how she openly wanted to tear children away from a family in Moscow.
Lindsay Lohan, 32, star of "Herbie: Fully Loaded", livestreamed how she attempted to take a Moscow family's children away from them.
Lindsay Lohan, 32, "Herbie: Fully Loaded" has herself live-streamed how she apparently wants to snatch the children from a family in Moscow.

seg.source: Das berichtet das US-Portal "TMZ" und veröffentlicht dazu einen teilweisen Mitschnitt des Streams.
seg.translation: This was reported by US portal "TMZ" with publication of a partial recording of the stream.
The US website "TMZ" reported the story and published a clip of the livestream.
This is reported by the US portal "TMZ" and a partial recording of the stream is published.

seg.source: Hier sehen Sie "Zum Glück geküsst" mit Lindsay Lohan
seg.translation: Here you can see the "Just My Luck" with Lindsay Lohan
Watch "Just My Luck" with Lindsay Lohan here
See "Luckily Kissed" with Lindsay Lohan

seg.source: In dem Clip ist zu sehen, wie Lohan aus einem Wagen aussteigt und zu einer womöglich obdachlosen Familie geht, die sie als Flüchtlingsfamilie aus Syrien ausgemacht haben will.
seg.translation: In the clip you can see how Lohan gets out of a car and goes up to a possibly homeless family, identified as a refugee family from Syria.
This clip shows Lohan stepping out of a vehicle and approaching what might be a homeless family who made themselves out to be refugees from Syria.
In the clip, Lohan is seen getting out of a car and walking to a possibly homeless family she claims to have identified as a refugee family from Syria.

seg.source: Als die Familie geradezu vor der Schauspielerin flüchtet, verfolgt Lohan die Eltern und ihre Kinder.
seg.translation: As the family flee in front of the actress, Lohan follows the parents and their children.
As the family moves away from the actress, Lohan pursues the parents and their children.
When the family virtually flees the actress, Lohan pursues the parents and their children.

seg.source: Sie bezichtigt die Erwachsenen Kinderhandel zu betreiben.
seg.translation: She accuses the adults of child trafficking.
She accuses the parents of engaging in child trafficking.
She accuses the adults of child trafficking.

seg.source: Für all das liefert sie in dem Clip keine Beweise.
seg.translation: Yet she does not offer any proof in the clip.
She provides no proof of this in the clip.
She provides no evidence for any of this in the clip.

seg.source: "Die ganze Welt sieht das gerade", ist Lohan in dem Video zu hören, wie sie die Familie weiter die Straße entlang verfolgt.
seg.translation: The whole world is watching, says Lohan in the video as she follows the family further down the street.
Lohan can be heard saying "the whole world is watching right now" as she continues to pursue the family down the street.
"The whole world is watching this," Lohan can be heard saying in the video as she continues to follow the family down the street.

seg.source: Offenbar versucht sie die Kinder von ihren Eltern zu trennen.
seg.translation: She seems to try to separate the children from their parents.
She appears to be attempting to take the children from their parents.
Apparently she is trying to separate the children from their parents.

seg.source: Irgendwann scheint es der offensichtlich wütenden Mutter jedoch genug zu sein.
seg.translation: At some point, however, it seems that the obviously angry mother had it enough.
Eventually, the angry mother appears to have had enough.
At some point, however, the obviously angry mother seems to have had enough.

seg.source: Es sieht so aus, als ob sie sich umdreht und Lohan eine Ohrfeige verpasst.
seg.translation: It looks as if they turn around and Lohan gets a slap in the face.
She appears to turn round and strike Lohan in the face.
It looks like she's turning around and giving Lohan a slap in the face.

seg.source: Unter Tränen beteuert die Schauspielerin daraufhin, wie schockiert sie ist - und sie hält sich die Wange.
seg.translation: In tears, the actress protests about how shocked she is - holding her cheek.
The tearful actress, holding her cheek, then said how shocked she was.
In tears, the actress then professes how shocked she is - and she holds her cheek.

seg.source: Was Lohan zu dieser Aktion bewogen hat, ist derzeit völlig unklar.
seg.translation: What provoked Lindsay Lohan to such very strange actions is currently completely unclear.
At this point, it is unclear what motivated Lohan to do this.
It is unclear at this time what prompted Lohan to take this action.
